Package DAO

Class CustomerDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
DAO.CustomerDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAOImpl extends Object implements CustomerDAO
This is the CustomerDAOImpl class which is an implementation of the CustomerDAO interface. This class defines the methods used to manipulate i.e. add/modify/delete/retrieve Customer data from/in the database.

    • addNewCustomer

      public void addNewCustomer(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phone, String createdBy, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionID) throws SQLException
      This method adds a customer to the database by use of an insert statement.
      Specified by:
      addNewCustomer in interface CustomerDAO
      Parameters:
      customerName - The customer's name.
      address - The customer's address.
      postalCode - The customer's postal code.
      phone - The customer's phone number.
      createdBy - The user who created the customer in the database.
      lastUpdatedBy - The user who last updated the customer data in the database.
      divisionID - The customer's division ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if there is a MySQL database access error.
